effect.x_y: Removes major status effects and confusion from every Pokémon in the user’s party.
effect.omega_ruby_alpha_sapphire: Removes major status effects and confusion from every Pokémon in the user’s party.

short_effect.x_y: Cures the entire party of major status effects.
short_effect.omega_ruby_alpha_sapphire: Cures the entire party of major status effects.

flavor_text.x_y: The user releases a soothing scent that heals all status conditions affecting the user’s party.
flavor_text.omega_ruby_alpha_sapphire: The user releases a soothing scent that heals all status conditions affecting the user’s party.
